Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Carrot = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true local vCharacter = Tool.Parent
local insertTable = {} local headTable = {} local torsoTable = {}
local co
local biteSound
local bunnyActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("BunnyActive")
-- getBunny bunnyLeftArm = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(50383173) bunnyLeftLeg = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(50383219) bunnyRightArm = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(50383126) bunnyRightLeg = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(50383252) bunnyTorso = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(50383074)
bunnyFace = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(1080949)
if bunnyLeftArm then bunnyLeftArm = bunnyLeftArm:GetChildren() bunnyLeftArm = bunnyLeftArm[1] end if bunnyRightArm then bunnyRightArm = bunnyRightArm:GetChildren() bunnyRightArm = bunnyRightArm[1] end if bunnyLeftLeg then bunnyLeftLeg = bunnyLeftLeg:GetChildren() bunnyLeftLeg = bunnyLeftLeg[1] end if bunnyRightLeg then bunnyRightLeg = bunnyRightLeg:GetChildren() bunnyRightLeg = bunnyRightLeg[1] end if bunnyTorso then bunnyTorso = bunnyTorso:GetChildren() bunnyTorso = bunnyTorso[1] end if bunnyFace then bunnyFace = bunnyFace:GetChildren() bunnyFace = bunnyFace[1] end
--
-- Wait until Tool is picked up or equipped by Character while vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil do wait() vCharacter = Tool.Parent end
charChildren = vCharacter:GetChildren() for c = 1, #charChildren do if charChildren[c].className ~= "Part" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Script" and charChildren[c].className ~= "LocalScript" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Humanoid" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Tool" and charChildren[c].className ~= "ForceField" then clone = charChildren[c]:Clone() table.insert(insertTable, clone) end if charChildren[c].Name == "Head" then headChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for a =1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].className == "Decal" or headChildren[a].className == "SpecialMesh" then clone = headChildren[a]:Clone() table.insert(headTable, clone) end end end if charChildren[c].Name == "Torso" then torsoChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for x=1, #torsoChildren do if torsoChildren[x].className == "Decal" then clone = torsoChildren[x]:Clone() table.insert(torsoTable, clone) end end end end
function onActivated()
if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
biteSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("BiteSound")
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
if biteSound then biteSound:Play() end
graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" and graphics[j].className ~= "ForceField" then graphics[j]:Remove() end end
bLA = bunnyLeftArm:Clone() bLA.Parent = vCharacter bLL = bunnyLeftLeg:Clone() bLL.Parent = vCharacter bRA = bunnyRightArm:Clone() bRA.Parent = vCharacter bRL = bunnyRightLeg:Clone() bRL.Parent = vCharacter bT = bunnyTorso:Clone() bT.Parent = vCharacter
bFace = bunnyFace:Clone() bFace.Parent = vCharacter
if co == nil or coroutine.status(co) == 'dead' then print("Coroutine created") co = coroutine.create(reset) coroutine.resume(co) bunnyActive.Value = 1 else print(coroutine.status(co)) -- do nothing end
Carrot.Transparency = 1.0
if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 28 end
while bunnyActive.Value == 1 do wait(1) end Tool.Enabled = true end
function reset() wait(25) bunnyActive.Value = 0 Carrot.Transparency = 0.0
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end if insertTable ~= nil then if morphResetSound then morphResetSound:Play() end graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" then graphics[j]:Remove() end end for i =1, #insertTable do clone = insertTable[i]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter end end end
function onEquipped() if bunnyActive.Value == 1 then Carrot.Transparency = 1.0 end end
function onUnequipped() --if bunnyActive then bunnyActive.Value = 0 end if Carrot then Carrot.Transparency = 0.0 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Carrot = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local connection
local bunnyActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("BunnyActive")
function blow(hit) humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") torso = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Carrot or rightGrip.Part1 == Carrot) then fire = Carrot:FindFirstChild("Fire") if fire then fire:Remove() end if connection then connection:disconnect() end tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(60) bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.P = 100000 bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(bv.P, bv.P, bv.P) bv.velocity = (torso.Position - vCharacter.Torso.Position).unit * 50.0 bv.Parent = torso wait(1.0) untagHumanoid(humanoid) if bv then bv:Remove() end end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid then tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag then tag:Remove() end end end
function onKeyDown(key) if key:lower() == "q" and bunnyActive.Value == 1 then fire = Carrot:FindFirstChild("Fire") if fire == nil then wait(1.0) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso then fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = Carrot connection = Carrot.Touched:connect(blow) end end end end
function onActivatedL() end
function onEquippedL(mouse) mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end
function onUnequippedL() end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedL) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedL) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedL)

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
